results.title: [Clinico-metabolic and anti-ischemic effects of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril and its role in the process of left ventricular remodeling in patients with diabetic heart].
results.text_hl: Clinico-metabolic and anti-@DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and its influence on processes of left @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@ventricular remodeling@@@ were studied on 64 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ and stable class II-III @<m>DISEASE_Neurocirculatory_Asthenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009449 @@@effort angina@@@ combined with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@; 30 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received standard therapy, 34--standard therapy plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (5 mg/day).

citations.NLM: Chilikina NS, Khasaev ASh, Abusueva ZS. [Clinico-metabolic and anti-ischemic effects of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril and its role in the process of left ventricular remodeling in patients with diabetic heart]. Kardiologiia. 2006;46(9):15-8. PMID: 17047617
